Title: Directs the department of civil service to conduct a study to determine the number of people with a disability employed by agencies
Summary: Directs the department of civil service to conduct a study to determine the number of people with a disability employed by agencies; requires the department to make a report including any recommendations to increase the number of people with disabilities employed by such agencies.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the department of civil service to conduct a study to determine the number of people with a disability employed by agencies; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
